game.name: OUTSIDE
game.genres: 액션, 캐주얼, 인디, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: DARES REALITY GAME SHOW with REAL NEIGHBORS and LIVE CAMERAS! Your friends dare you. Then lie, sabotage, and bet on your failure. Fail the dare, and you’re forced OUTSIDE — to the neighbors, or to a real-world dare on camera (optional, phone camera supported). A reality-bending, social exposure game
game.shortDescriptionEn: DARES REALITY GAME SHOW with REAL NEIGHBORS and LIVE CAMERAS! Your friends dare you. Then lie, sabotage, and bet on your failure. Fail the dare, and you’re forced OUTSIDE — to the neighbors, or to a real-world dare on camera (optional, phone camera supported). A reality-bending, social exposure game
